justification: Shows some ToM by pitching B on depth and friendly playoff schedules, but misreads B’s needs: calling Ethan Turner a TE upgrade is incorrect given B’s Darian Taylor (Tier 2). Ignores B’s preference for possession WRs and consensus rankings. Trade is feasible and A’s desire to consolidate into a workhorse fits, though Robinson’s low-volume offense conflicts with A’s high-powered offense preference. Rationale is brief and thin on evidence.
